CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Further investigation of photovoltaic performances indicates all devices present high V oc because of the relatively deep HOMO energy levels of these polymers , and the highest PCE of 5.05% was achieved based on PIDT-C12NT .

Let's think step by step.

1. Photovoltaic devices
2. Polymers (specific types not mentioned, so "polymers" in general)
3. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) energy levels
4. PIDT-C12NT (specific polymer with the highest PCE or Power Conversion Efficiency)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. Polymers (specific types not mentioned, like PIDT-C12NT)
2. PIDT-C12NT

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Polymers (specific types not mentioned, like PIDT-C12NT) |
| PIDT-C12NT |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Further investigation of photovoltaic performances indicates all devices present high V oc because of the relatively deep HOMO energy levels of these polymers , and the highest PCE of 5.05% was achieved based on PIDT-C12NT .

Let's think step by step.

1. Voc: Voltage open circuit (the maximum voltage that a photovoltaic device can produce under standard test conditions)
2. HOMO: Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital (energy level of the highest occupied molecular orbital in a polymer)
3. PCE: Power Conversion Efficiency (the ratio of the electrical power produced by a photovoltaic device to the power of the incident light)
4. PIDT-C12NT: A specific polymer used in a photovoltaic device.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. HOMO: Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital (energy level of a material)
2. Voc: Voltage open circuit (a material property of a photovoltaic device)
3. PCE: Power Conversion Efficiency (a material property of a photovoltaic device)
4. PIDT-C12NT: A specific material used in a photovoltaic device.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) |
| Voc (Voltage open circuit) |
| PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency) |
| PIDT-C12NT (specific material) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Further investigation of photovoltaic performances indicates all devices present high V oc because of the relatively deep HOMO energy levels of these polymers , and the highest PCE of 5.05% was achieved based on PIDT-C12NT .

Let's think step by step.

1. Voc: Voltage open circuit (the maximum voltage that a photovoltaic device can generate under standard test conditions)
2. HOMO: Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital energy level (a property of the polymers used in photovoltaic devices)
3. PCE: Power Conversion Efficiency (the percentage of energy that a photovoltaic device can convert from sunlight into electricity)
4. PIDT-C12NT: A specific polymer used in a photovoltaic device, with a highest recorded PCE of 5.05%.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. HOMO energy level (a material property of the polymers)
2. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency, a material property of the photovoltaic devices)
3. 5.05% (the specific value of PCE achieved with PIDT-C12NT)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| HOMO energy levels of these polymers |
| highest PCE of 5.05% |
| PCE of 5.05% achieved with PIDT-C12NT |
